endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of defined audience segments along with their details.
Create a new audience segment based on specified criteria.
Update the attributes or specifications of an existing audience segment.
Fetch performance analytics for all advertisements.
Submit criteria to compare the performance of multiple advertisements.
Retrieve the distribution overview of revenues generated by advertisements.
Modify targeting configurations such as regions or demographic filters.
Submit parameters to predict estimated performance metrics of an advertisement.
Remove an audience segment and its associated data securely.
Retrieve a list of recommended advertisements tailored for the currently active audience segments.
